suite.name: Robot Framework test run with a Postman Newman Collection running one Postman Folder at a time in serial random order

test.name: POSTMAN NEWMAN COLLECTION EXAMPLE PART TWO : Send a POST request to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts and check the response.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

arguments.arg: newman run ${PATH}//jsonplaceholder.typicode.com.postman_collection.json --folder 'Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' --reporter-cli-no-summary --color off --reporter-cli-no-console

kw.msg: Starting process: newman run /rfw//Tests//Part-Two--RFW-Strategies-For-Enhancing-Existing-Tests-And-Taking-Your-Test-Process-Further//Resources//jsonplaceholder.typicode.com.postman_collection.json --folder 'Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' --reporter-cli-no-summary --color off --reporter-cli-no-console
Waiting for process to complete.
Process completed.

kw.name: Get Process Result
kw.doc: Returns the specified `result object` or some of its attributes.
kw.msg:
${POSTMAN_POST_RESPONSE} = newman
jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
→ Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts [201 Created, 822B, 602ms]

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg:
newman
jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
→ Send POST to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts [201 Created, 822B, 602ms]

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Send Short Message Through Slack And Email
Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

arguments.arg: echo "The ${TEST_NAME} failed in the ${TEST_ENVIRONMENT} environment." | slacktee.sh -i :nerd_face: --plain-text --config /rfw/Shared-Resources/.slacktee

kw.msg: Starting process: echo "The regression tests in the Docker-Example-Postman-Newman-Enhanced-Version.robot file failed in the QA environment." | slacktee.sh -i :nerd_face: --plain-text --config /rfw/Shared-Resources/.slacktee
Waiting for process to complete.
Process completed.

kw.name: Send Email Notification
kw.doc: When a test fails you can send an email. Here are some examples that could work...

test.status:
*HTML* Re-executed test has been merged.
New status: FAIL
New message: 'newman jsonplaceholder.typicode.com → Send PATCH to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com PATCH https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1 [200 OK, 960B, 469ms]' contains '200 OK'
Old status: FAIL
Old message: 'newman jsonplaceholder.typicode.com → Send PATCH to jsonplaceholder.typicode.com PATCH https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1 [200 OK, 960B, 617ms]' contains '200 OK'

suite.doc: Part Two of the Postman Newman example has been enhanced by using the SharedKeywordsAndListeners.robot resource file to add 2 types of Robot Framework listeners and a team notification keyword. Also added the "--randomize tests" option in the commands-running-inside-a-docker-container.sh script, and will demonstrate the use of the "--rerunfailedsuites".

stat.name: Robot Framework test run with a Postman Newman Collection running one Postman Folder at a time in serial random order
